args.text:
The top 20 Python libraries for data science are:

- TensorFlow
- SciPy
- NumPy
- Pandas
- Matplotlib
- Keras
- SciKit-Learn
- PyTorch
- Scrapy
- BeautifulSoup
- LightGBM
- ELI5
- Theano
- NuPIC
- Ramp
- Pipenv
- Bob
- Caffe2
- Chainer
